articles.title: ‘I fight for sharks maimed by hooks & left to die in pain for up to THREE DAYS,’ says Shark Girl Madison St... - The Sun
articles.content:
A PREGNANT tiger shark hangs lifelessly from a metal hook, as the camera draws closer the predator blinks shes still alive and could suffer up to three days before her death.

articles.author: Callum Hoare
articles.title: Moon landing blunder: NASA admitted original Apollo 11 footage 'erased' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE MOON LANDING'S original tapes were 'erased and reused' after programme managers 'determined there was no longer a need' to keep them, NASA admitted.

articles.description: Technological advances could one day allow people to engineer their bodies to survive extraterrestrial conditions
articles.content:
DNA editing could allow humans to live on new planets within 500 years, a genetic engineering expert who has worked with Nasa has suggested.

articles.title: Yellowstone supervolcano latest: 'Intensifying' earthquake swarm spreads beneath lake - Daily Express
articles.description: A LARGE 'intensifying' earthquake swarm has rattled Yellowstone Lake, but USGS officials insist there is nothing to be concerned about.
